Rule.description: Cisco IOS command to encrypt the enable password. The command has several encryption modes: by default mode 0 will covert the entered text to SHA256 5 = MD5 4 = SHA256
Rule.fixtext: Apply the Cisco IOS command "enable secret" with password. There are comple of parameters that can be passed with the command. Example "enable secret 4 password" from global configuration mode.

Rule.description: Cisco IOS command to encrypt passwords, username passwords, authentication key passwords, console and vty passwords, BGP passwords. By default the service is not enabled.
Rule.fixtext: Apply the Cisco IOS command "service password-encryption" from the global configuration mode.
